user_stories.title: User Registration via Email
user_stories.user_story: As a new user, I want to register using my email address so that I can create an account and access the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter a valid email address and password.
System validates email format and password strength.
User receives a confirmation email after registration.
User cannot register with an already used email.
Registration is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard.

user_stories.title: User Login
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account securely.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password to log in.
System validates credentials and provides error messages for invalid input.
User is redirected to the dashboard upon successful login.
Account is locked after 5 failed login attempts.
User can log out from any page.

user_stories.title: Password Reset
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can request a password reset link via email.
System sends a secure reset link to the registered email.
User can set a new password using the reset link.
System validates the new password strength.
User is notified upon successful password reset.

user_stories.title: Profile Management
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details are accurate and up to date.
acceptance_criteria: User can edit name, profile picture, and contact information.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
User receives confirmation after updating profile.
System validates input formats (e.g., phone number).
User can view current profile information.

user_stories.title: View Dashboard
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view a personalized dashboard so that I can access relevant information and quick actions.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays user's name and profile picture.
Dashboard shows recent activity and notifications.
User can access main features from dashboard links.
Dashboard loads within 2 seconds.
User can customize dashboard layout.

user_stories.title: Create New Project
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to create a new project so that I can organize my work and collaborate with others.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter project name, description, and select team members.
Project is saved and appears in the project list.
System validates required fields before creation.
User receives confirmation upon successful creation.
User can assign roles to team members during creation.

user_stories.title: Edit Project Details
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to edit project details so that I can keep project information up to date.
acceptance_criteria: User can update project name, description, and team members.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
System validates input before saving changes.
User receives confirmation after editing.
Only project owners can edit project details.

user_stories.title: Delete Project
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to delete a project so that I can remove obsolete or unwanted projects from my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a project and delete it.
System prompts for confirmation before deletion.
Project is removed from the project list after deletion.
Only project owners can delete projects.
User receives notification of successful deletion.

user_stories.title: Invite Team Members
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to invite team members to a project so that we can collaborate effectively.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email addresses to send invitations.
Invited users receive an email with a join link.
Invitations are tracked in the project settings.
User receives confirmation after sending invitations.
Invited users appear in the team list upon acceptance.

user_stories.title: Manage Team Roles
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to assign and change team member roles so that responsibilities are clearly defined.
acceptance_criteria: User can assign roles (e.g., admin, editor, viewer) to team members.
Role changes are saved and reflected immediately.
Only project owners can change roles.
System prevents role changes for users not in the team.
User receives confirmation after updating roles.

user_stories.title: Create Tasks Within Project
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to create tasks within a project so that work can be organized and tracked.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter task name, description, due date, and assignee.
Task is saved and appears in the project task list.
System validates required fields before creation.
User receives confirmation upon successful creation.
Tasks are sortable by due date and priority.

user_stories.title: Edit Task Details
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to edit task details so that I can update information as work progresses.
acceptance_criteria: User can update task name, description, due date, and assignee.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
System validates input before saving changes.
User receives confirmation after editing.
Only assigned users or project owners can edit tasks.

user_stories.title: Mark Task as Complete
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to mark a task as complete so that progress is tracked and visible to the team.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a task and mark it as complete.
Completed tasks are visually distinguished from active tasks.
System records completion date and user.
User receives confirmation after marking complete.
Only assigned users or project owners can mark tasks complete.

user_stories.title: Comment on Tasks
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to comment on tasks so that I can communicate and share updates with my team.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter and post comments on a task.
Comments are displayed in chronological order.
User can edit or delete their own comments.
System notifies relevant users of new comments.
Comments are saved and visible to all team members.

user_stories.title: Receive Notifications
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive notifications about important events so that I stay informed about project updates.
acceptance_criteria: User receives notifications for task assignments, comments, and project changes.
Notifications are displayed in the dashboard and sent via email.
User can configure notification preferences.
Unread notifications are visually highlighted.
Notifications are marked as read after viewing.

user_stories.title: Search Projects and Tasks
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search for projects and tasks so that I can quickly find relevant information.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter keywords to search projects and tasks.
Search results are displayed in real-time.
Results include project and task names, descriptions, and assignees.
User can filter search results by status and date.
Search returns accurate and relevant results.

user_stories.title: Export Project DATF
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to export project dATF so that I can share or archive information outside the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a project and export dATF in CSV or PDF format.
Export includes project details, team members, and tasks.
System confirms export completion and provides download link.
Exported files are formatted correctly.
Only project owners can export project dATF.

user_stories.title: Integrate with Calendar
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to integrate project tasks with my calendar so that I can manage deadlines efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: User can link their calendar (Google, Outlook) to the platform.
Task due dates are synced to the calendar.
User can enable or disable calendar integration.
System notifies user of sync status.
Calendar events update automatically when task dates change.

user_stories.title: Access Help and Support
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to access help and support resources so that I can resolve issues and learn how to use the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can access a help center from the dashboard.
Help center includes FAQs, guides, and contact form.
User can submit support requests and receive responses.
System tracks status of support requests.
User receives notification when support request is resolved.

user_stories.title: View Activity Log
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to view an activity log so that I can track changes and actions within my projects.
acceptance_criteria: Activity log displays actions by users (e.g., task creation, edits, comments).
Log includes timestamps and user names.
User can filter log by date and action type.
Log updates in real-time.
Only project owners can view the full activity log.

summary: 20 comprehensive user stories have been generated, covering all major functional requirements: user authentication, profile management, dashboard, project and task management, collaboration, notifications, search, export, calendar integration, help/support, and activity tracking.
